body: thanks for the quick response. i wonder if my membership is in some kind of broken state. * in response to an empty mail sent to `golang-nuts+subscribe@googlegroups.com` I get ``` Hello liam@stask.net, The group you attempted to subscribe to is invite only. You must be invited by the group owner. If you have questions related to this or any other Google Group, visit the Help Center at https://groups.google.com/support/. Thanks, Google Groups ``` * there is no `join group` button when I visit https://groups.google.com/forum/#!forum/golang-nuts * when I click `new topic` it takes me to the compose view, and when I try to change my display name (just to try), I see the following prompt and clicking on `join group to change` has no effect * when I try to post a test msg via the web UI, I get `You do not have permission to access this content. (#554)`
